name: ParasoftStaticAnalysisQualityGate
description: Check Parasoft Static Analysis Quality Gate
author: Parasoft Corporation

inputs.name: type
inputs.label: Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type of issues to be evaluated for the threshold.

inputs.name: severity
inputs.label: Severity
inputs.helpMarkDown: Severity of issues to be evaluated for the threshold.

inputs.name: threshold
inputs.label: Threshold
inputs.helpMarkDown: If the number of issues is greater than or equal to this threshold, then a build is considered unstable or failed, respectively. Default value is 0.

validation.message: The value must be greater than or equal to 0

inputs.name: buildStatus
inputs.label: Build status if quality gate fails
inputs.helpMarkDown: Mark the build as unstable or failed if the quality gate fails.
